name: purescript-es2015-codegen
description: PureScript with ES2015 modules codegen for improved tree shaking.

scripts.test: stack build && rm -rf es2015-modules/output && stack exec purs -- compile es2015-modules/src/*.purs --output es2015-modules/output && parcel es2015-modules/src/index.html

author: Daniel Gasienica <daniel@gasienica.ch>
